name: Demolition Boy
description:
Demolition Boy has some demolition work to do, but there's one problem - he's nearly out of bombs.

Bummer:(

Help Demolition Boy to blast all the crates with given bombs to reveal the exit.

  • 35 puzzling levels
  • Special bombs for special needs
  • Retro-style graphics

Controls:

  • WASD - Moving
  • [SPACE] - Explode
  • [R] - Restart
  • [ESC] - Return to menu
